message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a great price of $130.  I think it would be very beneficial for you and I'm excited to see what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and I am willing to pay $100 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you see the value in this product.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $120.  I believe that's a fair price that reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still interested in purchasing the product and I am willing to pay $110.
